definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: The compressive strength is of returning fluid sample blocks is about 60% of coring blocks.
sentences.chinese: 返漿試塊的抗壓強度約爲取芯試塊的60%。

sentences.english: This is called an equation of state.
Where now there is additional pressure here.
sentences.chinese: 現在這裏有附加的壓強。

sentences.english: The compressive strength and porosity of the product are measured.
sentences.chinese: 對製品進行抗壓強度和氣孔率的測試觀察。

sentences.english: And this is the derivative with respect to pressure.
sentences.chinese: 這是化學勢對壓強的導數。

sentences.english: For instance, the pressure and the temperature, or the volume and the pressure.
sentences.chinese: 比如壓強和溫度，或體積和壓強。

sentences.english: And get Kp is equal to some number, to the, times bar to some power. That would be wrong.
sentences.chinese: 得到Kp等於一個數，乘以壓強的某次方，這是錯的。

sentences.english: So we can put that in here and do this integral.
sentences.chinese: 因此把壓強帶入到這裏，算出積分。

sentences.english: At our temperature and pressure, it's given by mu naught in the gas phase.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的溫度和壓強下，是氣相中的μ零。

sentences.chinese: 內部氣體壓強爲p1，體積爲。

sentences.english: External pressure is p3. It's higher than p2.
First let's set the external pressure equal to zero.
And if you're below this temperature here, this quantity, p times v it would be negative.

sentences.english: The impact force and pressure are described about the pre-mixed abrasive waterjet.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了前混合磨料清砂的衝擊力和衝擊壓強。

sentences.english: The compressive strength of the composite was measured using a electronic universal -testing machine.
sentences.chinese: 複合材料的抗壓強度用電子萬能實驗機測試。

definition: ājñā or ajna, the brow or third eye chakra 查克拉, residing in the forehead/also written 眉間輪|眉间轮[mei2 jian1 lun2]
good prospects in the long term (finance)
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
mūlādhāra or muladhara, the root or Saturn chakra 查克拉, residing in the coccyx
lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
mutually related karma (idiom); fates are intertwined/interdependent
